description: This file defines an Angular component named 'NoteEditorComponent' used for editing notes within the application. It manages input note data, tags, and folders, and emits events for saving or deleting notes.

classes.name: NoteEditorComponent
classes.description: Angular component for editing and managing notes, including handling tags and folders.

methods.name: ngOnChanges
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that updates the draft note when input note changes.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Emits the save event with the current draft note.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Emits the delete event with the note's ID.

methods.name: toggleTag
methods.description: Toggles the presence of a tag ID in the current note's tag list.

methods.name: isTagActive
methods.description: Checks if a tag ID is associated with the current note.
